title: Apple shares short film by South Korean director Park Chan-wook shot on iPhone 13 Pro
content:
Apple is once again highlighting the iPhone 13’s camera features with its traditional “Shot on iPhone” campaign. This time, the company has shared on YouTube the short film “Life is But a Dream” made by South Korean director Park Chan-wook – which of course was shot entirely on iPhone 13 Pro.

more…

The post Apple shares short film by South Korean director Park Chan-wook shot on iPhone 13 Pro appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple shared the short film "Life is But a Dream" by South Korean director Park Chan-wook – which was shot on an iPhone 13 Pro.
